field_condition_and_expectation.title: 1.5 hours from Bandung
field_condition_and_expectation.description: Estimated time on normal traffic if you're taking ride from the heart of Bandung.

field_condition_and_expectation.title: Temperature range 10º-26ºC
field_condition_and_expectation.description: It's breezy even when it's midday and the temperature could drop very low when it's raining outside.

field_condition_and_expectation.title: An uphill meadow with natural terrain
field_condition_and_expectation.description: To go to the cabin, you need to climb a few stairway steps with a lot of gravel. This might appear challenging for the elders.
